data.text:
FAQs

Worldwide shipping

Will ship worldwide - if your country is not listed in shipping countries, please contact us.

Shipping options:

STANDARD AIRMAIL NZ$6.50 World (NZ$5 Aus)

Letter-rate service, no tracking/insurance but without custom charges on receipt.

>> FREE for orders over NZ$60: promo code FREEPOST6

TRACKED AIRMAIL (upgrade option)

This service is tracked, insured for the declared value (up to NZ$250)

>> FREE for orders over NZ$200: promo code ADDTRACK

LOCAL PICK-UP

Available in Wellington, NZ

Listing requests

Please feel free to send us a list of titles or names via Contact Us page. If in stock, will list them straight away. If not, we can source them for you. This usually takes 1 - 2 months. There is no charge for this service and estimate will be given before proceeding.

Soldout items may also be re-stocked by request.

Delayed deliveries

Postal situation do vary by countries.

If the packet hasn't arrived after 4 weeks, it is recommend first asking at your local mail depot / sorting office (where all mails are sorted, not the post office), they could be keeping it there or have a record of it. Your order is shipped in a C4 envelope.

Most customers choose standard shipping, which is letter rate airmail without tracking/insurance but a reliable service. Insured shipping upgrade with tracking is available at checkout at extra cost.

What is printed on reverse side?

Reverse side of Japanese Chirashi posters are all about the film it's promoting. It can be reviews, comments or interviews. Usually the lower end is reserved for release date for national or individual theatres. Actual copy you purchase could have different lower end from the item image.

Gift wrapping

Simple gift wrapping is available at a small cost with choices of papers. It can be left unsealed by request for you to add your own card etc. inside. Each little posters in presentation bag. No shop receipt is enclosed.

How to claim refund for order lost in post

In the very unfortunate circumstance when the packet is lost in post, full refund (up to NZ$250) is given only when the customer used shipping upgrade.

Procedure is as following:

1. Order details will be submitted to New Zealand Post along with customer's address

2. New Zealand Post will contact customer to verify the address.

3. After the procedure is followed by the customer, NZ Post will refund the full amount to the seller.

4. Following this, customer will receive full refund from the seller.

Bulk discount

Please contact us before ordering and ask, happy to discuss amount or maybe we can add extra items of your choice for free as discount.

We also offer good discount by way of free shipping and upgrade. Please refer to the top of the section, thanks!

Customer account

You are welcome to create account at Etsy.com before placing your order. Login link is available at checkout.
